General.Name: Jiangxi Naipu Mining Machinery
General.Description: Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and services heavy-duty mine dressing equipment and wear-resistant spare parts in China. It offers slurry pumps, mill spare parts, cylindrical sieve, vibrating screen spare parts, cyclone, rubber composite parts, and flotation machine spare parts series. The company was formerly known as Jiangxi Naipu Mining Machinery and New Materials Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. in August 2020. Naipu Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shangrao, China.
